name: Chang Tang
story: Shun grew up in a small rural village in China. He was trained in martial arts from a young age by his grandfather, who was a former soldier. When he turned 18, he joined the People's Liberation Army and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship skills. After a successful mission in Afghanistan, he was recruited by the OPFOR to serve as their top marksman. Despite his quiet and stoic demeanor, Shun is fiercely loyal to his colleagues and will do anything to complete his mission.
